TriggerOraclev10g.name: REFUNDS_BDR_TRG
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare
lErrCode NUMBER;
lErrMsg VARCHAR2(4000);
lRec refunds_jn%rowtype;
begin
--
-- Journal section.
lRec.internal_id := :old.internal_id;
lRec.from_date := systimestamp;
--
altpayint_journal_pkg.refunds_jn_prc (
p_process => altpayint_journal_pkg.IS_DELETING
,p_rec => lRec
,p_err_code => lErrCode
,p_err_msg => lErrMsg);
--
IF lErrCode <> 0 THEN
raise_application_error (-20001, 'REFUNDS_BDR_TRG trigger, ' || lErrMsg);
END IF;
end;
